https://tmrev.io/movie/158476-Brass Band 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Based on Haruko Kashiwagi's popular comic, the film traces a group of high-school kids as they try to revive the school's shabby brass band, and also attempt to discover the reasons behind one of the members' weird habit: Yuriko Seryu (Beni Arashiro) goes sexually wild whenever she hears good music, and mauls the boys around her. Brass Band
